inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| summarize TotalBytesSent = sum(BytesSent) by Computer, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| summarize Total_Traffic = sum(BytesSent) + sum(BytesReceived), TotalBytesSent = sum(BytesSent), TotalBytesReceived = sum(BytesReceived) by Computer | sort by Total_Traffic desc | project-away Total_Traffic

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
ServiceMapComputer_CL
| summarize by Computer, Region = iff(HostingProvider_s == "azure", AzureLocation_s, "non-azure")
| project Region 
| summarize count() by Region

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| summarize TotalBytesReceived = sum(BytesReceived) by Computer, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
ServiceMapComputer_CL
| where HostingProvider_s == "azure"
| summarize by AzureResourceID = AzureResourceId_s
| project Subscription = split(AzureResourceID, "/")[2]
| summarize count() by tostring(Subscription)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
ServiceMapComputer_CL
| where HostingProvider_s == "azure"
| summarize by Computer, Region = AzureLocation_s, IPv4Addresses = Ipv4Addresses_s, IPv6Addresses = Ipv6Addresses_s, AzureResourceID = AzureResourceId_s

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
ServiceMapComputer_CL
| where HostingProvider_s != "azure"
| summarize by Computer, IPv4Addresses = Ipv4Addresses_s, IPv6Addresses = Ipv6Addresses_s

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIp)
| where Direction == "inbound"
| summarize TotalBytesCommunicated = sum(BytesSent) + sum(BytesReceived), TotalSent = sum(BytesSent), TotalReceived = sum(BytesReceived) by MaliciousIP = strcat(MaliciousIp, ' (', RemoteCountry, ')') | sort by TotalBytesCommunicated desc
| where TotalBytesCommunicated > 0 
| project-away TotalBytesCommunicated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIp)
| where Direction == "inbound"
| summarize TotalTraffic = sum(BytesSent) + sum(BytesReceived) by Country = RemoteCountry | sort by TotalTraffic desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIp)
| where Direction == "inbound"
| summarize TotalTraffic = sum(BytesSent) + sum(BytesReceived) by IndicatorThreatType | sort by TotalTraffic  desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIp)
| where Direction == "inbound"
| summarize TotalBytesSent = sum(BytesSent), TotalBytesReceived = sum(BytesReceived) by MaliciousIP = strcat(MaliciousIp, ' (', RemoteCountry, ')') | sort by TotalBytesReceived desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIp)
| where Direction == "inbound"
| summarize TotalBytesSent = sum(BytesSent), TotalBytesReceived = sum(BytesReceived) by Computer | sort by TotalBytesReceived desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIp)
| where Direction == "inbound"
| summarize TotalBytesSent = sum(BytesSent), TotalBytesReceived = sum(BytesReceived) by Computer | sort by TotalBytesReceived desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIp)
| where Direction == "inbound"
| summarize TotalBytesSent = sum(BytesSent), TotalBytesReceived = sum(BytesReceived) by ProcessName, DestinationPort, Protocol | sort by TotalBytesReceived desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIp)
| where Direction == "inbound"
| summarize TotalTraffic = sum(BytesSent) + sum(BytesReceived) by Target = strcat (Computer, '/', ProcessName, '/', DestinationIp, '/', DestinationPort) | sort by TotalTraffic  desc

content.PartTitle: Attack targets, by computer, process, IP address, and port

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIp)
| where Direction == "inbound"
| summarize TotalBytesSent = sum(BytesSent), TotalBytesReceived = sum(BytesReceived) by Process = strcat (ProcessName, ' (', DestinationPort, ',', Protocol, ')') | sort by TotalBytesReceived desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
VMConnection 
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIp)
| where Direction == "inbound"
| summarize TotalBytesSent = sum(BytesSent), TotalBytesReceived = sum(BytesReceived) by Computer, ProcessName, DestinationIp, DestinationPort | sort by TotalBytesReceived desc
